articles.description: The BBC star – who is battling terminal cancer – has had a rose created in her honour. She highlighted that the roses will live beyond her and hopes her daughter will carry them in a bouquet the day she gets married.
articles.content:
Dame Deborah James paid a visit to the Chelsea Flower Show in London this week to celebrate a new rose that has been created in her honour.
The 40-year-old BBC presenter was made a Dame earlier this… [+3126 chars]

articles.title: TV tonight: Jack Rooke’s Big Boys is really beautiful television - The Guardian
articles.description: Dylan Llewellyn and Jon Pointing star in the coming-of-age drama. Plus: Art That Made Us looks at post- second world war earthshakers. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
